alert.note: Alert for Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Whiteside, eastern Carroll and Stephenson Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Milledgeville, or near Polo, moving north at 15 mph. Other storms between Freeport and Sterling are also strong. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shannon and Freeport. This includes Interstate 88 between mile markers 33 and 36. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
